summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Energy-Morph Dashboard MVP for Tesla Gigafactory power grid management. All core features functional with excellent backend API performance (100% success rate) and working frontend components.

design_issues.issue: Console warnings about chart width/height (-1) when containers are initially hidden
Export buttons not visible in UI despite working APIs
Limited query input elements visible in UI

passed_tests: All 30 backend API endpoints (100% success rate)
Dashboard loads with all panels and components
KPI cards display with sparklines and correct data
Morphing heatmap shows power zone distribution with interactive controls
SNN predictions panel with working tabs (Predictions/Neural Activity)
Blockchain tracker shows transactions and energy breakdown
Real-time data updates and zone status indicators
No error messages or broken functionality
action_item_for_main_agent: Consider adding visible export buttons to UI and enhancing query interface input elements for better user experience. All core functionality is working correctly.
